named-query.name: BC_READ_RATING_SUMMARIES_BY_ITEM_ID_AND_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT ratingSummary FROM org.broadleafcommerce.rating.domain.RatingSummary ratingSummary WHERE ratingSummary.ratingTypeStr = :ratingType AND ratingSummary.itemId IN (:itemIds)

named-query.name: BC_READ_RATING_SUMMARY_BY_ITEM_ID_AND_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT ratingSummary FROM org.broadleafcommerce.rating.domain.RatingSummary ratingSummary WHERE ratingSummary.ratingTypeStr = :ratingType AND ratingSummary.itemId = :itemId
